documentation.text: @notice prices posted should be scaled using `PRICE_DECIMALS` decimals
@notice we throw an error if the price is older than `MAX_LAG` seconds
@notice this event is emitted when the price of `asset` is updated

@notice the asset registry used to find the mapping between
 a token address and its address
@notice if this is `true`, the oracle will revert if the price is stale
@notice returns the last update of `asset` or 0 if `asset` has never been updated
@notice Updates prices using a list of signed prices received from a trusted signer (e.g. Coinbase)

@notice Upates the price with a message containing the price information and its signature
 The message should have the following ABI-encoded format: (string kind, uint256 timestamp, string key, uint256 price)

PriceUpdated(address,uint256,uint256).notice: this event is emitted when the price of `asset` is updated

MAX_LAG().notice: we throw an error if the price is older than `MAX_LAG` seconds

PRICE_DECIMALS().notice: prices posted should be scaled using `PRICE_DECIMALS` decimals

assetRegistry().notice: the asset registry used to find the mapping between a token address and its address

getLastUpdate(address).notice: returns the last update of `asset` or 0 if `asset` has never been updated

getPriceUSD(address).notice: Quotes the USD price of `tokenAddress` The quoted price is always scaled with 18 decimals regardless of the source used for the oracle.

params.tokenAddress: the asset of which the price is to be quoted

returns._0: the USD price of the asset

postPrice(bytes,bytes).notice: Upates the price with a message containing the price information and its signature The message should have the following ABI-encoded format: (string kind, uint256 timestamp, string key, uint256 price)

postPrices((bytes,bytes)[]).notice: Updates prices using a list of signed prices received from a trusted signer (e.g. Coinbase)

preventStalePrice().notice: if this is `true`, the oracle will revert if the price is stale

trustedPriceSigner().notice: address of the trusted price signer This should be the Coinbase signing address in production deployments i.e. 0xfCEAdAFab14d46e20144F48824d0C09B1a03F2BC
